title: Geordie Shore's Aaron Chalmers reveals his girlfriend is pregnant in 'best surprise'
text:

Geordie Shore star Aaron Chalmers is going to be a dad, he excitedly confirmed today.

The tattooed hunk, 32, took to Instagram on Tuesday evening to reveal the happy news that his girlfriend Talia Oatway is pregnant.

He posted a string of cute snaps, including one of a baby scan, a booties and mittens set, babygros and a cookie with 'Baby Chalmers' iced on the front.

Aaron captioned the photos: "The BEST surprises are the 1s you don’t expect.... I’m going to be a DADDY!!! Can’t wait to meet you."

Talia confirmed the news on her own Instagram account with a super cute picture of the couple with her daughter.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She wrote: "When 3 become 4, my little world is complete."

It is Aaron's first child but Talia has a daughter, Siennah, from a previous relationship.

The couple were rumoured to have split up earlier this month after two years together.

(Image: Instagram)

They called it quits after a series of rows and unfollowed each other on Instagram, it was claimed.

Shortly after they met in 2017 Aaron said he thought Talia was the one.

He said: "Obviously I think she is, as otherwise I’d just be wasting time. She’s literally my best friend – she's my number one fan when it comes to my fights, and she’s the one that kicks me out of bed in the morning when I’m going on runs and I’m staying at hers.

"She’s literally my number one supporter."

Aaron's time on Geordie Shore was dominated by his on/off relationship with his ex Marnie Simpson.

Marnie is currently expecting her first child with Casey Johnson.
